name: DARKNESS - 1GAM Oct 2017
description:
Every second you brings you closer to being consumed by the all encompassing darkness. Find the magical items and combine them to release their illuminating power that makes the darkness flee.

Made by Taylor Buchheit @ Game Dev's Quest. First submission to One Game a Month. For more information go to http://www.onegameamonth.com/. Thanks to Christer Kaitila (McFunkyPants) for the inspiration.
